name: Open Decision - Backend
description: Backend for Open Decision - an Open Source No-Code Expertsystem

NODE_ENV.description: Used to identify the environment, should be set to 'production' if deployed. Valid values: 'production', 'development', 'test'.

ACCESS_TOKEN_SECRET.description: CHANGEME: change ASAP to a long random string, otherwise the application is insecure.

REFRESH_TOKEN_SECRET.description: CHANGEME: change ASAP to a long random string, otherwise the application is insecure.
